summary: Diff implements the blue/white theme tokens, adds ElectroBeez logo to header and hero, adds contact links in the header, updates favicon/title, and adds a DOMAIN_SETUP.md guide with DOMAIN/CANISTER_ID placeholders. However, evidence for the required footer logo/contact updates is not visible in the provided truncated diff summary, and backend changes were introduced despite being unnecessary for the requested frontend/documentation work.

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer section of the landing page includes the ElectroBeez logo (or a compact variant) with appropriate sizing and spacing.
missing_requirements.reason: LandingPage.tsx is truncated before the footer, and no other footer component diff is shown; the diff summary does not provide direct code evidence of a footer logo being rendered.

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer includes the email and phone number displayed as text and as clickable links (mailto:electrobeezindia@gmail.com and tel:+918638493216).
missing_requirements.reason: SectionNav.tsx shows clickable email/phone in the header, but LandingPage.tsx is truncated and does not show the footer; no direct diff evidence confirms footer contact links.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister-id storage API (setCanisterId/getCanisterId) added to backend/main.mo.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states backend changes are not required for logo/theme/contact updates and should only be added if strictly necessary; the diff adds new backend functionality unrelated to the requested UI/theme/logo/contact/doc changes.
